engineering_design_principles.mechanism: Defining a limit beyond which matter and energy cannot return to the external universe, ensuring isolation and preservation of a system.
Utilizing the distortion of spacetime caused by extreme gravitational forces to create a spherical surface that acts as a one-way membrane.
Creating a surface that only allows matter and energy to pass through in one direction, preventing anything from escaping the system's grasp.
Representing the underlying mathematics of the system's behavior, controlling the interaction between matter and energy.
